metric_test.cpp

Compute the Levenshtein distance of two (char*) bitstrings. Make sure that the bitstrings have the form "00110101010...".

00001 //===========================================================================
00054 //===========================================================================
00055 
00056 
00057 #include <iostream>
00058 #include "Metric/Metric.h"
00059 
00060 int main( )
00061 {
00062   char *s1 = "0100010100";
00063   char *s2 = "1010111010";
00064 
00065   std::cout << std::endl << "Levenshtein distance" << std::endl;
00066   std::cout << "+ between " << s1 << " and " << s2 << " is " << Metric::Levenshtein( s1, s2 ) << std::endl;
00067 
00068   std::cout << std::endl;
00069 
00070   std::cout << "Hamming distance" << std::endl;
00071   std::cout << "+ between " << s1 << " and " << s2 << " is " << Metric::Hamming( s1, s2 ) << std::endl;
00072 
00073   std::cout << std::endl;
00074 
00075   return 1;
00076 }
